DeclaredTypeElementCollection Class

Definition

Handles the XML elements used to configure XML serialization using the DataContractSerializer.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public sealed class DeclaredTypeElementCollection : System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection

Remarks

This class is used to handle the <dataContractSerializer>, specifically, to allow the addition of types to the collection of known types.

Constructors

Initializes a new instance of the DeclaredTypeElementCollection class.

public DeclaredTypeElementCollection ();
